kubejs.ponder.tag.createastral.descripti: Tips and Tricks specific to this modpack
kubejs.ponder.custom_machine_item.header: You shouldn't see this ponder, it's a debug thing.
kubejs.ponder.electrolyser.header: How to create the electrolyser multiblock
kubejs.ponder.electrolyser.text_1: Leave a gap in the center
kubejs.ponder.electrolyser.text_2: Pump water into the bottom of the Electrolyser
kubejs.ponder.electrolyser.text_3: Pump oxygen out of the side of the Electrolyser
kubejs.ponder.electrolyser.text_4: Oxygen pumped into the Oxygen Loader can be used to fill up your spacesuits and tanks
kubejs.ponder.melter.header: How to use the seared melter
kubejs.ponder.melter.text_1: This is an example of a basic seared melter setup
kubejs.ponder.melter.text_2: First, a seared heater is placed, which can be filled with fuel
kubejs.ponder.melter.text_3: Then, a melter is placed on top, and when the heater below is fueled, it can melt ores into liquid
kubejs.ponder.melter.text_4: Finally, faucets are placed on the sides, which can be used to pour the liquid into a casting basin or table
kubejs.ponder.melter.text_5: Create fluid pipes can be used to transfer the liquid to something like a Spout
kubejs.ponder.set_replace_modify_tutoria: The casings don't have to be accurate. This also works
The Desizer will shrink a 3x3x3 cube of blocks down into a single item
It's powered by Redstone. Place a button on the back of the Desizer Controller
If it doesn't detect a valid recipe, it will just break the blocks
kubejs.ponder.shimmer_refinery.header: How to create a Shimmer Refinery
kubejs.ponder.shimmering_stone.header: How to create the Moon Portal
kubejs.ponder.shimmering_stone.text_1: In this pack, the nether is disabled. Instead, items are spread throughout the different planets.
kubejs.ponder.shimmering_stone.text_2: There is a new portal added, which takes you to the moon!
kubejs.ponder.stone_growth_chamber.text_: Similarly, valid glass blocks can be found by searching '$createastral:stone_growth_chamber/glass_blocks'
This is a completed Stone Growth Chamber
Use an Andesite Funnel on the front or a Hopper on the bottom to output Andesite
When built using different Stones, the Stone Growth Chamber will generate different types of cobblestone
This currently works with Stone, Andesite and any default stone from each planet, like Moon Stone and Mars Stone
A list of valid stone blocks can be found by searching '$createastral:stone_growth_chamber/building_blocks' in REI
